name: Smoked Chicken Soup With Fennel And Spaetzle
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 pounds smoked chicken, cut in 3/4-inch dice

recipeInstructions.text: Using a six-quart saucepan, combine the chicken stock, chicken and leeks. Simmer, covered, for five minutes, or until the leeks are tender.
Add the fennel and simmer two minutes longer. Season with salt and pepper.
Just before serving, add the spaetzel. Bring to a simmer until heated through.
